column5: Are there any motels in Sioux Loookout that a father/son group could stay for a night? If so what are the names and how much roughly per night? Also is there a good bait shop in Sioux Lookout that a person can purchase leeches and crawlers from?
There is a new Best Western just before town.
call the lamplighter hotel 1-877-737-0377 they like fisher people,hey its great for fishing many lakes in the area.

As mentioned already there is a best western & the lamplighter. Never stayed at the lamplighter just the western. It ran us about $100/ night but we had 5 guys per room. As for bait there is a place called Ojibway Outfitters where we buy minnows etc. before we go out to our lodge. Regards, ch47
